alert.note: Alert for Adams; Blackford; Jay; Wells (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 01 at 12:11AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Blackford, Wells, Adams and Jay Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1211 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ossian to 8 miles southwest of Muncie. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bluffton, Decatur, Portland, Hartford City, Berne, Dunkirk, Montpelier, Redkey, Geneva, Monroe, Pennville, Westchester, Center, Preble, Nottingham, Uniondale, Bryant, Poneto, Vera Cruz and Wellsburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
